# INFO to be entered in the Alfred Terminal settings (Kept here just for reference.) # alfredpreferences://navigateto/features>terminal --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
on alfred_script(shellCmd) # Launch Wezterm if needed (Appname is `WezTerm`, processname is `wezterm-gui`) tell application "WezTerm" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "wezterm-gui" delay 0.05 end repeat end tell delay 0.1
# 1. use builtin to not trigger aliases, `-q` to suppress hooks (chpwd) # 2. Add `clear` to suppress the entering message # 3. Add leading space, so it is not saved to the history due HIST_IGNORE_SPACE if (text 1 thru 3 of shellCmd) is "cd " then set arg to text 4 thru -1 of shellCmd set shellCmd to " builtin cd -q " & arg & " && clear" end if
# DOCS https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/cli/cli/send-text do shell script ("export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH ;" Â¬ & "echo '" & shellCmd & "' | wezterm cli send-text --no-paste") end alfred_script
